text: Bridging the Gap is the second studio album by American hip hop group Black Eyed Peas, released on September 26, 2000. This is their last album as Black Eyed Peas, before they changed their name to "The Black Eyed Peas" and the last album with Kim Hill as a member. == Track listing == ==Chart positions== ===Album=== Chart (2000–01) Peak position ===Singles=== Year Single Chart positions US US R&B; US Rap 2000 "BEP Empire" — — 44 "Weekends" — 73 34 2001 "Request + Line" 63 51 2 ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Black Eyed Peas albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Alternative hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Interscope Records albums
title: Bridging the Gap (Black Eyed Peas album)
